person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: There are lots of other things in this life I have n't tried either , " he said .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, there is only one speaker who is expressing their thoughts. Therefore, there is only one "Person" entity in this paragraph, which is the pronoun "I" or "he" referring to the speaker.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

In the given paragraph, the only relevant entity that clearly refers to a person is the pronoun "he." The pronoun "I" is also a person, but it is not explicitly mentioned in the paragraph. Instead, it is implied as the speaker of the sentence. Therefore, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

* he (or the speaker)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
